remoterenegade: You know, I’ve just been admiring this shot, zooming in and gently allowing my eyes to take in your beauty. I felt my heart swell, at the sight of your being, in all your glory. It was only after I came back for a second look that I started paying closer attention to your shift and it started dawning on me that it’s a hospital gown. Honey, it’s testament to your mighty fierce- and fine-ness that you can rock this look in a way that fills up the space and you totally own it - outshining any sense of hospital and the fear and anxiety associated with these visits. Sending you soothing, supportive feelings. It’s only natural that the follow ups bring a multitude of feelings to come visit. See how many of us are holding you in our thoughts? We got you.
